trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is typically only done within elements that support a scrollable region, or otherwise deliberately set their rendering size smaller than the combined desired size of their child element content, and is only done by deliberately handling the event once it has routed upwards in the element tree and has reached the first parent that offers scrolling region support.
trans-unit.target: Processar este evento apenas é geralmente feito dentro de elementos que suportam uma região deslocável ou, caso contrário deliberadamente definir o tamanho de composição menor do que o tamanho pretendido combinado de conteúdo de elemento os respetivos subordinados e só é feito ao deliberadamente processar o evento depois de que tem encaminhados upwards na árvore de elemento e atingiu o primeiro principal, que proporciona um suporte de região deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: An existing implementation that handles scrolling regions in a manner that is typically desirable for user controls is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação que gere o deslocamento regiões de forma que é normalmente desejável controlos de utilizador é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can register a class handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> and supplement the base class handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: Se derivar de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, pode registar um processador de classe para <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>e completar o processamento de classe base do evento.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You should also consider using or class-handling the class-defined <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged> event instead of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Deve também considerar a utilizar ou classe de processamento de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged>eventos em vez de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged> classe definida

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you create an entirely custom class that does not derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can still add class handling by calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your class instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se criar uma classe personalizada inteiramente que não deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, pode ainda adicionar classe de processamento chamando <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>na sua Instanciação de classe.</xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For details on class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o processamento de classe, consulte [marcar os eventos encaminhados como Handled e processamento de classe](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Content elements can cause the event to be raised by their content hosts (through calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A> and raising <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> from the content host).
trans-unit.target: Elementos de conteúdo podem fazer com que o evento a ser gerados pelos respetivos anfitriões conteúdos (através de chamar <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>e que gera <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>do anfitrião de conteúdos).</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can request logical tree elements to be brought into view with the helper method <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, pode pedir elementos da árvore lógica para ser colocada numa vista com o método de programa auxiliar <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> implements a related but different method <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>implementa um método relacionado, mas diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>
